about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: You must show proof of insurance to law enforcement:

about.name: You must show proof of insurance to law enforcement:

hasPart.assesses: You must show proof of insurance to law enforcement: | You must show proof of insurance to law enforcement: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You must have evidence of financial responsibility, such as proof of insurance, with you whenever you drive. You must always show proof of insurance and your license to an officer upon request after a traffic stop or collision.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if you are involved in a collision.

comment.text: Only if you are involved in a collision.

suggestedAnswer.text: If you are involved in a collision or stopped for a citation.

comment.text: If you are involved in a collision or stopped for a citation.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if you are stopped and cited.

comment.text: Only if you are stopped and cited.

acceptedAnswer.text: If you are involved in a collision or stopped for a citation.

comment.text: If you are involved in a collision or stopped for a citation.

answerExplanation.text: You must have evidence of financial responsibility, such as proof of insurance, with you whenever you drive. You must always show proof of insurance and your license to an officer upon request after a traffic stop or collision.

comment.text: You must show proof of insurance to law enforcement: | You must have evidence of financial responsibility, such as proof of insurance, with you whenever you drive. You must always show proof of insurance and your license to an officer upon request after a traffic stop or collision.

hasPart.name: Excessive speed:
hasPart.assesses: Excessive speed: | Excessive speed: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Excessive speed is one of the most common contributing factors to vehicle crashes. Excessive speed does not save time and often leads to high-risk decision-making.

suggestedAnswer.text: Saves time so you can get to your destination more quickly.

comment.text: Saves time so you can get to your destination more quickly.
Helps you maneuver around obstacles.

suggestedAnswer.text: Increases the likelihood of serious bodily injury and death.

comment.text: Increases the likelihood of serious bodily injury and death.

acceptedAnswer.text: Increases the likelihood of serious bodily injury and death.

comment.text: Increases the likelihood of serious bodily injury and death.

answerExplanation.text: Excessive speed is one of the most common contributing factors to vehicle crashes. Excessive speed does not save time and often leads to high-risk decision-making.

comment.text: Excessive speed: | Excessive speed is one of the most common contributing factors to vehicle crashes. Excessive speed does not save time and often leads to high-risk decision-making.

hasPart.name: This sign indicates:
hasPart.assesses: This sign indicates: | This sign indicates: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: This is a low clearance warning sign. It indicates the distance from the road surface to the bottom of a bridge or overpass (in this case, 12 feet, 6 inches).

suggestedAnswer.text: The distance from road surface to a bridge or overpass.

comment.text: The distance from road surface to a bridge or overpass.

suggestedAnswer.text: The maximum legal height of a vehicle allowed in this state.

comment.text: The maximum legal height of a vehicle allowed in this state.

suggestedAnswer.text: The maximum width of a vehicle allowed on the highway.

comment.text: The maximum width of a vehicle allowed on the highway.

acceptedAnswer.text: The distance from road surface to a bridge or overpass.

comment.text: The distance from road surface to a bridge or overpass.

answerExplanation.text: This is a low clearance warning sign. It indicates the distance from the road surface to the bottom of a bridge or overpass (in this case, 12 feet, 6 inches).

hasPart.name: You must file a report of a traffic accident occurring in California when:

about.name: You must file a report of a traffic accident occurring in California when:

hasPart.assesses: You must file a report of a traffic accident occurring in California when: | You must file a report of a traffic accident occurring in California when: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When you have a collision, report it to DMV within 10 days if anyone was injured (no matter how slightly) or killed. You or your representative must make this report whether or not you caused the collision, even if the collision occurred on private property.

suggestedAnswer.text: Your vehicle fails a smog test.

comment.text: Your vehicle fails a smog test.

suggestedAnswer.text: You are involved in a collision and there is an injury.

comment.text: You are involved in a collision and there is an injury.
You change your insurance company.

acceptedAnswer.text: You are involved in a collision and there is an injury.

comment.text: You are involved in a collision and there is an injury.

answerExplanation.text: When you have a collision, report it to DMV within 10 days if anyone was injured (no matter how slightly) or killed. You or your representative must make this report whether or not you caused the collision, even if the collision occurred on private property.

comment.text: You must file a report of a traffic accident occurring in California when: | When you have a collision, report it to DMV within 10 days if anyone was injured (no matter how slightly) or killed. You or your representative must make this report whether or not you caused the collision, even if the collision occurred on private property.

hasPart.name: Any amount of alcohol in the blood may affect a driver's:

about.name: Any amount of alcohol in the blood may affect a driver's:

hasPart.assesses: Any amount of alcohol in the blood may affect a driver's: | Any amount of alcohol in the blood may affect a driver's: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A driver’s ability to safely operate a vehicle may be impaired at any BAC level, even a level lower than the legal limit. Any amount of alcohol can affect one’s judgment and physical coordination. Driving under the influence of even a small amount of alcohol can lead to criminal charges.

comment.text: Right-of-way privileges.
Judgment and physical coordination.
Knowledge.
Judgment and physical coordination.

answerExplanation.text: A driver’s ability to safely operate a vehicle may be impaired at any BAC level, even a level lower than the legal limit. Any amount of alcohol can affect one’s judgment and physical coordination. Driving under the influence of even a small amount of alcohol can lead to criminal charges.

comment.text: Any amount of alcohol in the blood may affect a driver's: | A driver’s ability to safely operate a vehicle may be impaired at any BAC level, even a level lower than the legal limit.
